title: Hilton Indulgence in the Heart of Osaka
description: Discover the bright lights and food delights of Osaka, dubbed Japan's food capital, staying at the luxurious Hilton Osaka. One of the top-rated Hilton hotels in the world that is ideally located in the city’s entertainment district. Enjoy guaranteed upgrade to a Deluxe Room, daily buffet breakfast, a buffet dinner experience, nightly cocktails at the spectacular 35th floor bar, an exclusive Hilton Mascot gift and a guaranteed late 2pm checkout.
offer_address: 1 Chome-8-8 Umeda, Kita, Osaka, Osaka Prefecture 530-0001, Japan

title: Ultimate Osaka Luxury: Sky-High Umeda Escape with Oversized Rooms, Daily Breakfast & Nightly Drinks
description:
Discover a new level of luxury at InterContinental Osaka by IHG, a sophisticated sanctuary in the heart of Umeda’s Grand Front Osaka complex. With direct access to some of the city’s most coveted dining, shopping and entertainment - and just moments from Osaka Station - it’s a convenient launchpad for exploring Osaka and venturing further afield to Kyoto, Kobe and Nara.

Space is a true luxury in Japan, and here it’s offered in abundance. Each light-filled room is framed by floor-to-ceiling windows and styled with contemporary design and understated Japanese elegance. Explore a suite of five-star facilities, including the Meguri Spa & Wellness, which specialises in traditional Japanese treatments. There’s also an indoor pool, jet bath, sauna, expansive fitness centre and an authentic Japanese bathhouse.

Culinary experiences are just as elevated, with five distinct dining venues to tempt every palate. Sample delicate pastries at STRESSED Patisserie, sip cocktails to the sound of live music at the swanky gin-focused adee Lounge & Bar, or savour refined French cuisine at Michelin-starred Pierre - the crown jewel of the hotel’s dining scene.

title: Hilton Indulgence in the Heart of Osaka
description: Discover the bright lights and regional delights of Osaka with a three-night escape to the luxurious Hilton Osaka - one of the top-rated Hilton hotels in the world. Enjoy a guaranteed upgrade to a Deluxe Room, daily buffet breakfast, buffet dinner experience, nightly cocktails at the spectacular 35th floor bar and guaranteed late 2pm checkout for two.
offer_address: 1 Chome-8-8 Umeda, Kita, Osaka, Osaka Prefecture 530-0001, Japan

title: Elegant Michelin Guide Hotel with Eight Restaurants & Award-Winning Spa
description:
Experience understated elegance at this Michelin guide stay in the heart of Osaka. With refined dining at its centre, you will be spoiled with eight exquisite onsite restaurants including the renowned rooftop Kunsei Kitchen and fresh seafood cuisine at Embassy of Crab.

Located just a short stroll from Osaka Station, the hotel offers easy access to the stunning Osaka Castle and the world-renowned Universal Studios Japan. After a day of exploration, enjoy a rejuvenating treatment at the award-winning Spa Cenvaree, bringing Thai wellness to Osaka city.
offer_address: 2 Chome-11-50 Nanbanaka, Naniwa Ward, Osaka, 556-0011, Japan

title: Osaka Serene Sanctuary in Entertainment District
description: Surrounded by luminous neon lights and indulgent street eats, ANA Crowne Plaza Osaka, an IHG Hotel, is a calming refuge to retreat to after a day indulging in fun, fashion and food. Gaze out over calming views of the Dojima River, savour gastronomic greatness at the many onsite restaurants or take a refreshing plunge into the indoor pool before adventuring out onto the energetic streets of Dotonbori or retiring to a lavish guest room for a sound slumber.
location_description: ANA Crowne Plaza Osaka, an IHG Hotel
offer_address: 1 Chome-3-1 Dojimahama, Kita Ward, Osaka 530-0004, Japan

title: Osaka Opulence Moments from Osaka Castle with Indoor Pool, Wellness Spa & Five Restaurants & Bars
description:
Soar to new heights of Japanese luxury and refined relaxation at this forward-thinking retreat. Patina Osaka blends Japanese elegance with contemporary sophistication, offering a serene sanctuary amidst the city's dynamic energy. Indulge in the teppanyaki artistry of BARIN or savour a hyper-seasonal tasting experience at P72, with ingredients harvested from the hotel’s impressive gardens.

Start your morning with Japanese tea and French pastries in the soft light of Nijiri, and end your day with an expertly crafted nightcap at Sonata Bar & Lounge, gazing out over the illuminated castle. With every considered detail - be it a cryotherapy session, rejuvenating facial in one of six private suites or a theatrical teppanyaki dinner at BARIN - Patina Osaka offers more than just a place to stay, it’s a luxurious sanctuary to indulge the senses.

title: Central Osaka InterContinental Luxury with Five Dining Options & Japanese Bathhouse
description: Japan's vibrant culinary capital of Osaka is awaiting your visit, and there's no better base than the InterContinental Osaka, an IHG Hotel. Between excursions exploring the city, retreat to the calm of the fourth floor, home to an indoor swimming pool, fitness centre and Japanese-style baths. When hunger strikes, the five onsite eateries are sure to satisfy any cravings, with sophisticated Michelin-starred French cuisine a highlight.

title: Central Contemporary Osaka City Break
description: Japan's culinary capital awaits: choose voco Osaka Central, an IHG Hotel, as your base while you hop between the city's best sushi, teppanyaki and ramen restaurants. Striking the perfect balance between modern and traditional, the hotel features historical Kyomachi elements with contemporary furnishings throughout. When you start craving a succulent steak for dinner, head to the Western Grill Retaurant, or if it's happy hour and you're after a tipple or two, the onsite bar is at your disposal.
location_description: voco Osaka Central, an IHG hotel

title: Stylish Osaka Escape in Bustling & Vibrant Entertainment District
description: The contemporary Holiday Inn Osaka Namba, an IHG Hotel, gives you access to culinary culture, extensive entertainment and an abundance of vibrant shopping opportunities. Step outside the hotel and shop up a storm at the myriad of department stores nearby, line up at the world-famous Okonomiyaki Mizuno, or take in the breathtaking vistas of greater Osaka from observation deck of Tsutenkaku tower. The best of Osaka really is at your doostep from this centrally located base.
location_description: Holiday Inn Osaka Namba, an IHG Hotel

title: Sophisticated Five-Star Osaka Escape Above Namba Station with Six Restaurants
description:
Embrace the vibrant energy of Osaka with a stay at this elegant five-star Swissôtel oasis, perfectly positioned in the heart of the Namba district. Spend your time swimming laps in the heated indoor pool, relax with a Japanese sauna and bath or embark on a gastronomic journey across the hotel's six restaurants and bars, specialising in dim sums, teppanyaki-style dining and modern European cuisine.

If you're looking to explore, the bustling shopping district of Shinsaibashi is only moments away, while Dotonbori and Kuromon also make for great attractions and give a peep into the city's lively nightlife. Back at your hotel, sip on well-crafted cocktails from Table36, perched on the hotel's topmost floor and enjoy the glittering cityscape of Osaka.

title: Prestigious Osaka Riverside Retreat with 17 Restaurants & Bars
description: A tranquil Japanese oasis in the heart of Osaka awaits with a stay at the prestigious RIHGA Royal Hotel Osaka, Vignette Collection. From the moment you step inside this high-end hotel, expect to be mesmerised and calmed as you are met with awe-inspiring architecture - like a waterfall in the main lounge area - and a warm Japanese welcome. Make the most of the world-class facilities, boutique shopping and 17 onsite restaurants and bars for an Osaka stay you're unlikely to forget.
location_description: RIHGA Royal Hotel Osaka, Vignette Collection
offer_address: 5 Chome-3-68 Nakanoshima, Kita Ward, Osaka, 530-0005, Japan
